Hello! Welcome to my blog. I am The Meridian Sun. Here on this blog you will be able to find my photography works as well as everything I like across the internet world.

A WONDERFUL COMPLEXITY

|

May 21, 2020

|

Photography

|

4 Comments

A Wonderful Complexity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

TRIPPING OUT - LED BY A DRESSED MONEY

|

May 20, 2020

|

Videography

|

1 Comments

Filmed on Mars 5, 2020, a mostly first-person chronicle of the day's events leading up to a performance in Wolllongong, Australia. Shot on Canon 5D mkII with 50mm 1.2 and 24-70 lenses.

FLYINGPOOL - GOLDMINE

|

May 18, 2020

|

Music

|

No Comments

Flyingpool · Goldmine

FlyingPool est un projet dreampop aux accents parfois shoegaze parfois folk et issu de la collaboration entre Elena Lacroix (chant, guitare, clavier) et Antoine Colen (batterie, guitare), deux multi-instrumentistes qui partagent une même passion: créer des mélodies sensibles et envoutantes. Le groupe est accompagné sur scène d'une série de synthétiseurs pour former des nappes atmosphériques et des basses rondes.

A DAY IN THE LIFE

|

May 17, 2020

|

Photography

|

No Comments

He must have friend tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldn't have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there that he had never felt before.


"Oh, God", the thought, "what a strenuous career it is taht I've chosen! Travelling day in and day out."
